verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:12
verses.text: And he sent, and brought him in. Now he was ruddy, and withal of a beautiful countenance, and goodly to look to. And the Lord said, Arise, anoint him: for this is he.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:13
verses.text: Then Samuel took the horn of oil, and anointed him in the midst of his brethren: and the Spirit of the Lord came upon David from that day forward. So Samuel rose up, and went to Ramah.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 16:14
verses.text: But the Spirit of the Lord departed from Saul, and an evil spirit from the Lord troubled him.
